server_details.bot_token: insert Discord bot developer token here
server_details.bot_id: insert ID of the bot user
server_details.warnings_id: insert ID of channel to send warnings to
server_details.reports_id: insert ID of channel to send reports to
server_details.automod_id: insert ID of channel to send automoderator actions to
server_details.modaction_id: insert ID of channel to send moderator actions to
server_details.announcements_id: insert ID of channel to send announcements to
server_details.welcome_id: insert ID of channel to send welcomes to
